resources.string: Tracking your IP address is disabled by default. Enable it to see your address history. You can always change this setting in the app settings.
You are about to enable tracking your IP address. This will allow the app to save your address history. You can always change this setting in the app settings.
Failed to fetch your IP address
This allows the app to save your address history.
This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to clear the history?
You have disabled saving history. Tap to enable.
